usefulItems: round ovenproof dish (18 x 6 cm), thermal serving bowl or other large bowl, oven grill
title: Broccoli and three cheese pasta bake

ingredients.content: 30 g cheddar cheese, cut into cubes (3 cm)
30 g mozzarella cheese, cut into cubes (3 cm)
30 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into cubes (3 cm)
½ - 1 tsp sea salt, to taste, plus 2 pinches extra for cooking water
150 g broccoli, cut into small florets
½ - 1 tsp ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Grease a round ovenproof dish (approx. 18 x 6 cm) and set aside.
Place cheddar cheese, mozzarella and Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>4 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place water and 2 pinches sea salt, to taste into mixing bowl and heat <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add pasta to mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position and weigh broccoli into it. Steam <b>8-10 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Transfer pasta and broccoli into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and cover to keep warm. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place butter, plain flour, milk, ground nutmeg, mustard powder, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and cook <b>6 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Add 70 g of the reserved grated cheese and heat <b>1 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Add reserved pasta and broccoli and combine <b>15 sec//speed 1<b>.
Transfer into prepared dish then top with remaining grated cheese and paprika. Place under grill (200°C) for 5 minutes or until cheese is golden. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Broccoli has impressive health benefits and goes a long way to keeping you fighting fit, regardless of how busy your schedule. A 100 g serve of broccoli provides 150% of your RDI for calcium, is high in fibre; vitamin A; iron; vitamin K; B-complex vitamins; zinc; phosphorus and; phyto-nutrients.
Serve either as a main meal or as a side dish with grilled chicken or steak.
If making this dish for one, transfer any leftovers into a freezable container and place into the freezer to enjoy later in the week.
